Docs.summary: The Microsoft.VisualBasic namespace contains types that support the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] Runtime in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about the language elements in the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] Runtime, see [Visual Basic Language Reference](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
